title: memecoinmeme
author: memecoinmeme
content: MemeStock is not just another meme token;¬† is a clever fusion of laughter and real financial opportunities.¬† Pre-sales are underway, and with innovative crowdfunding and lottery, MemeStock promises not only fun but also tangible utility.¬† ¬† Attractive entry price: Investing in the Presale means acquiring tokens at $0.0028, with a fixed trading price of $0.014.¬† An opportunity for an initial profit of X5.‚úîÔ∏èToken Name: MemeStock Token ‚úîÔ∏èToken Symbol: MSM‚úîÔ∏èToken Decimals: 18‚úÖTotal Supply : 1,200,000,000.‚úÖTokens For Presale: 600,000,000‚û°Ô∏èSoft Cap: 50 ETH‚è∞Presale Start Time: 2023.11.15‚è∞Presale End Time: 2023.12.25üëçListing: Uniswapüî∂ Contract address: 0x03484A6d7fE284Ade268961cf36ED94e9d6C5839üåç Website: https://www.memestocktoken.com/üê¶ Twitter: https://x.com/MemestockToken‚û°Ô∏èBuy: https://www.memestocktoken.com/Telegram: https://t.me/+fNw23PPfrndmNjgxDiscord: https://discord.gg/cZz6CUPSkf

comments.author: Tytanowy Janusz
comments.body: Quote from: memecoinmeme on November 04, 2023, 05:43:43 AMAttractive entry price: Investing in the Presale means acquiring tokens at $0.0028, with a fixed trading price of $0.014.¬† An opportunity for an initial profit of X5.hocus pocus, magic spells and this is how the investor earns 5x just because the developer of the new meme coin (AKA Scam coin) promised him so. This is not a scam at all, you can trust me... XDXDI warn everyone against buying these tokens. This is another thread about this token, and another one without specifying what specific utility this token has, and promises of 5x right from the begining is a big red flag. Nobody gives away money for free, especially not random people from the Internet who operate in the scamcoin industry.pepe is one project that pumped that hard out of 100,000 that failed just after launch. And it was certainly not announced this way, it just started quietly and people found out about it after the market operator (market manipulator) had already made 100x pump. The risk/reward of investing in scamcoins is definitely not worth it.

comments.author: kentrolla
comments.body: Just sick of the way you guys promote these shit coins wherein once in a blue moon a project like Pepe gets succeeds wherein others even fail to make into a decent exchange and even if they reach they don't sustain as they dets dumped immediately and even if they somehow manages to reach some good CEX they gets removed like hundred have already been removed from Binance due to manipulation or shady practices. However, I have gone through the whitepaper of this project where there are lot of promises but there isn't a single explaination about how they they are going to do it as some of their promises like helping migrants and all requires partnership with various organisations and local councils.I would like to conclude by saying that we should not be part of any projects which are purely based on memes or NFT, as these can be part of the project by not the project itself as we need project which has real life use case.

comments.author: libert19
comments.body: Quote from: memecoinmeme on November 04, 2023, 05:43:43 AMPre-sales are underway, and with innovative crowdfunding and lottery, MemeStock promises not only fun but also tangible utility. ¬†Such vague statement. What innovative crowdfunding and what tangible utility you talk about? Aside from your obvious scam, any coin/token that 'promises' and have nothing to show in "right now" is futile and will not go anywhere. Quote from: memecoinmeme on November 04, 2023, 05:43:43 AMüëçListing: UniswapWow! Such generous listing. Quote from: memecoinmeme on November 04, 2023, 05:43:43 AMAttractive entry price: Investing in the Presale means acquiring tokens at $0.0028, with a fixed trading price of $0.014. ¬†An opportunity for an initial profit of X5.Such generous offer. Tell your friends and family to invest so they can make easy money.

comments.author: Fundamentals Of
comments.body: This is very familiar to me. I have been a victim of ICO or pre-sale. This isn't simple math. Fixed trading price could be set at $1 while the pre-sale price could be set at $0.001. No one can prevent any new project from doing that. But once the trading commences, the price doesn't really start at $1. Neither will it start at the price on the pre-sale. If it's easy x5, you can buy all of them because that's certain profit. But it isn't the truth right?

comments.author: bluebit25
comments.body: All the information surrounding what the OP mentioned shows that this is a true sh*tcoin and is just taking advantage of some hype about a certain project to fool those hoping for quick profits. I always think that participants let greed cloud the knowledge that we all recognize that there are many risks, when they only like to talk about possible profits (in reality, it never happens), the few that appear in this space create exaggerations that are not the basis for people to talk about opportunities.For stubborn people, it is true that scammers who want to prey on people's greedy psychology have difficult ways to spread in the direction of ''FLEX'', and their nature never has those things. , it's best to stay away from things like this and their counterparts in the crypto space.

comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: I have seen lots of threads for this meme token already. Isn't that enough to discuss about it? I do understand that most of the members who will create more threads about a certain token because they are also invested in it but creating a new one doesn't mean it will boost the number of investors who will purchase it. It would be better if we could keep it clean in one thread and maybe help out by explaining what the feature of this token is and it's best utility there than piling up threads with the same name over and over again. Sure, it's a different title but it's all the same inside. Good luck boosting it, but I really doubt this is helping. It might actually be the vice versa results which means more members here will just ignore it. That's not how marketing works in this forum.

comments.author: Marykeller
comments.body: Because this is a memecoin, you shouldn't have high hopes for it because it has no utility other than laughter. What gives you the belief¬†that investors in this memecoin will receive a x5 profits? You should reconsider your opinion on this memecoin and accept the fact that it won't soar in value as Pepe did because it's a laughing coin. If you have any profits, I would advise you to take them out. You shouldn't hold out hope for x5 gains anytime soon as the price decline will be more severe. I'm starting to realize that today's price is different from yesterday's. A good number of investors have lost money as a result of purchasing when it was 0.028, and it is 0.025 as of now.

comments.author: tvplus006
comments.body: Yes, the team is in a hurry to get money from gullible investors, which I hope is not on our forum. Only on October 6, 2023, the domain for this meme coin was registered, and already on November 15 they are thinking of holding a pre-sale. If the team is so confident that the investor will receive x5, then they do not need to arrange a pre-sale, keep these coins and increase your deposit by 500%.

comments.author: JeffBrad12
comments.body: when a meme coin does pre sale, you know before hand that its just shit meme coin trying to grab money from gullible investors as many said.big fat chance the dev just gonna leave the meme coin out after they got the money, moreover the dev is talking about fixed trading price, really?how much money does the dev will to spent to wall the price at that rate, i believe its zero, this kind of thing, is massive red flag and obvious one at that, anyone who still invested into these kind of overpromising coinbasically just want to throw their money into trash bin because they know since the first time they sees this coin its just a scam coin.

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: Quote from: Fundamentals Of on November 04, 2023, 01:03:48 PMThis is very familiar to me. I have been a victim of ICO or pre-sale. This isn't simple math. Fixed trading price could be set at $1 while the pre-sale price could be set at $0.001. No one can prevent any new project from doing that. But once the trading commences, the price doesn't really start at $1. Neither will it start at the price on the pre-sale. If it's easy x5, you can buy all of them because that's certain profit. But it isn't the truth right?Indeed, this is a very familiar story and the story that convinced many people to shell out funds as they are looking forward to the promise of x5 or even x10...and then they soon realized that they are holding empty plastic bags with worthless tokens. Good for people who understand the risks involved and know when to dispose of the shit tokens so they can make some handsome profits. There is no question that most meme tokens and even those involving NFTs are here just to make as much money as they can and just let the project die along the road. We must always be careful and must remember that words and promises are so cheap.

comments.author: wxa7115
comments.body: Quote from: Tytanowy Janusz on November 04, 2023, 08:47:24 AMQuote from: memecoinmeme on November 04, 2023, 05:43:43 AMAttractive entry price: Investing in the Presale means acquiring tokens at $0.0028, with a fixed trading price of $0.014.¬† An opportunity for an initial profit of X5.hocus pocus, magic spells and this is how the investor earns 5x just because the developer of the new meme coin (AKA Scam coin) promised him so. This is not a scam at all, you can trust me... XDXDI warn everyone against buying these tokens. This is another thread about this token, and another one without specifying what specific utility this token has, and promises of 5x right from the begining is a big red flag. Nobody gives away money for free, especially not random people from the Internet who operate in the scamcoin industry.pepe is one project that pumped that hard out of 100,000 that failed just after launch. And it was certainly not announced this way, it just started quietly and people found out about it after the market operator (market manipulator) had already made 100x pump. The risk/reward of investing in scamcoins is definitely not worth it.This is the very first thing that I thought when I read that, since when developers can decide the price at which their token will be traded? It simply makes no sense at all and yet I am sure there are many newbies out there that think this is a great opportunity, even when it should be obvious this is not the case.Still there is not much we can do as even if we keep warning those newbies about the danger of investing in those meme coins they do not listen, since they believe they are smarter than us and somehow even with their inexperience they think they know more about this market than we do.
